cards.name: Slime
cards.flavor: A summoned slime, at your command.

cards.name: The Witch

effect.hex: Select one of the top 3 cards of this minion's /ancestry/ and switch it with the top card.
effect.ancestor: At the end of your turn, you can reshuffle this card to activate this minion's /Hex/ ability.

cards.flavor: A mysterious old lady said to be capable of polymorphism.

effect.hex: Reshuffle up to the top 3 cards of its /ancestry/. Activate the /Hex/ ability of all cards added back to the deck.

effect.command: If this minion is on the outer ranks, add the top card in any minion's /ancestry/ to your hand. Otherwise, add the top 2 cards from the deck to the /ancestry/ of a minion.
effect.trait: Whenever a card is going to be summoned over this minion, any player can return 2 cards from your hand to the deck to cancel it.

cards.name: Admiral

effect.hex: Activate the /Command/ ability of the minion on the left or on the right.
effect.command: Deal 2 damage to the opposing minion.

cards.flavor: A captain of the sea that commands the wind. Maybe.

cards.name: Imp

effect.trait: Whenever this minion is targeted by a /Hex/ or /Command/ effect, before it resolves, you can choose to put a card from your hand on top of this minion. Activate any /Hex/ effects.

cards.flavor: A playful little creature that disappears on the blink of an eye.
